0203.name: Unknown
0203.message:
A communication error has occurred.

The network may be busy, or the signal
strength may be weak. Make sure there
are no obstructions between the
console and the wireless router or other
network device, or adjust the wireless
channel in your device's settings, and
try again.

If the problem persists, it is possible
that the DNS settings are incorrect.

Please check these settings under the
Internet option in System Settings.
